articles.author: Hannah Ward-Glenton
articles.title: European markets higher after UK fiscal U-turns; EU energy announcement expected - CNBC
articles.description: European markets higher after UK fiscal U-turns
articles.content:
LONDON European markets are higher as the region feels the impact of the U.K.'s fiscal U-turns on Monday and anticipates new EU measures to tackle energy prices. The Stoxx 600 index is up 0.4%.
